statements: SELECT * FROM Celebrities WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, nationality FROM Celebrities ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities WHERE nationality='American';
SELECT name, age, nationality FROM Celebrities ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM Celebrities WHERE nationality='British' AND age < 40;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM Celebrities WHERE nationality = 'American' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT name, age, nationality FROM Celebrities WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT id, name, nationality FROM Celebrities WHERE nationality IN ('American', 'British') ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY age ASC, nationality DESC;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities;
SELECT name, nationality FROM Celebrities ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM Celebrities WHERE nationality = 'American';
SELECT * FROM Movies ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT title, release_date FROM Movies WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, nationality FROM Celebrities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, title, release_date FROM Movies ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT name, nationality FROM Celebrities WHERE nationality = 'American' LIMIT 3;
SELECT title FROM Movies WHERE title LIKE '%Love%' AND release_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, title, release_date FROM Movies WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM Celebrities WHERE nationality = 'British');
SELECT * FROM celebrities;
SELECT name, nationality FROM celebrities WHERE nationality = 'American';
SELECT title, release_date FROM movies ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT id FROM awards WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT id, award_name FROM awards WHERE celebrity_id = 1;
SELECT c.name, m.title FROM celebrities c JOIN movies m ON c.id = 1 AND m.release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT a.award_name, c.nationality FROM awards a JOIN celebrities c ON a.year = 2020 AND c.id = a.celebrity_id;
SELECT m.title, a.year FROM movies m JOIN awards a ON m.id = a.id WHERE m.release_date < '2019-01-01';
SELECT c.name, m.title, a.award_name FROM celebrities c JOIN movies m ON c.id = a.celebrity_id JOIN awards a ON m.id = a.id WHERE c.nationality = 'American' ORDER BY m.release_date DESC;
SELECT c.name, a.award_name, m.title FROM celebrities c JOIN awards a ON c.id = a.celebrity_id JOIN movies m ON a.id = m.id GROUP BY c.name HAVING COUNT(a.id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM celebrities;
SELECT id, name, age, nationality FROM celebrities;
SELECT title, release_date, genre FROM movies;
SELECT id, name, category, year FROM awards;
SELECT follower_id, following_id FROM followers;
SELECT name, age, nationality FROM celebrities WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT title, genre, release_date FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Drama' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT name, category, year FROM awards WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT title, celebrity_id FROM movies JOIN celebrities ON movies.celebrity_id = celebrities.id WHERE celebrities.nationality = 'American';
SELECT followers.follower_id, celebrities.name FROM followers JOIN celebrities ON followers.following_id = celebrities.id;

SELECT name, nationality FROM Celebrities WHERE nationality = 'American';
SELECT title, director FROM Movies ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM Awards WHERE year >= 2010 AND category = 'Best Actor';
SELECT title, author, publish_year FROM Books WHERE publish_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, nationality FROM Celebrities WHERE nationality='USA';
SELECT * FROM Movies WHERE director = 'Christopher Nolan' AND release_year > 2010;
SELECT title, release_year FROM Movies WHERE nationality='UK' ORDER BY release_year ASC;
SELECT * FROM Awards WHERE category LIKE '%Best%' AND year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020;
